meaning: acknowledge, witness, discern, recognize, appreciate, believe

onyomiExamples.meaning: recognition, awareness, perception, understanding, knowledge, cognition, cognizance, cognisance
official recognition, authorization, authorisation, licence, license, accreditation

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to recognize, to recognise, to observe, to notice, to deem, to judge, to assess, to approve, to deem acceptable, to allow, to admit, to accept, to confess (to a charge), to watch steadily, to observe carefully, to renown, to give renown to, to appreciate, to acknowledge
to write (e.g. a letter), to draw up (a document), to take down (e.g. notes), to have (lunch, dinner, etc.), to eat
